newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB 13wk bills yield 12.4pct, undersubscribed.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB 13wk bills yield 12.4pct, undersubscribed.

text.p: Average yield in an auction on Thursday offering five billion crowns 13-week Czech National Bank (CNB) liquidity bills was 12.4 percent, and the Dutch auction was undersubscribed with accepted bids totalling 3.477 billion crowns, the CNB said.
Gross yield in the last auction offering three billion crowns in similar bills on January 30 was 12.4 percent, and it was undersubscribed, with bids totalling 1.336 billion crowns.
